Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~fennelD7 You mean it works the first time (reduces value to $99), but not the second time? Perhaps the second update got invalidated due to being included in the same block (collision on same key)? Please provide more details.

Action.author: fenneld7
Action.body: ~denyeart Hi, I mean it didn't work both times. When I just invoked and then queried, items' value didn't change, so I looked into the chaincode container's log, as showed above. In the log, we can see chaincode did calculated, item A was 99 in the process, but it didn't put the 99 back into world state successfully. so when I query again, it showed 100, when I invoked again, calculation started from 100, result into 99 again. As no one reported the same bug, it may concern my environment and is rare case.

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~fennelD7 closing this issue. Please reopen if you continue to see this problem
